special_abilities.name: Brute.
special_abilities.desc: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).

special_abilities.name: Heart of Hruggek.
special_abilities.desc: The bugbear has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, stunned, or put to sleep.

special_abilities.name: Surprise Attack
special_abilities.desc: . If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage from the attack.

actions.name: Multiattack.
actions.desc: The bugbear makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Morningstar.
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Javelin.
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage in melee or 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage at range.
